verses.text: Now these \add are\add* the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* and his \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* with \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.
\w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*, \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*,
\w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*, and \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*,
\w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, and \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, and \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w*.

And all the \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* that came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w loins|strong="H3409"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* were \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*: for \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* was in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \add already\add*.\f + \fr 1.5 \ft loins: Heb. thigh\f*
And \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, and all his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and all that \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*.

¶ And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* were \w fruitful|strong="H6509"\w*, and increased \w abundantly|strong="H8317"\w*, and \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w*, and waxed \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w mighty|strong="H6105"\w*; and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* was \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with them.
Now there arose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* a \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, which \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* not \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, Behold, the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add are\add* \w more|strong="H7227"\w* and \w mightier|strong="H6099"\w* than we:

Come \w on|strong="H3051"\w*, let us deal \w wisely|strong="H2449"\w* with them; lest they \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w*, and it come to pass, that, when there falleth \w out|strong="H7122"\w* any \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, \w they|strong="H1931"\w* \w join|strong="H3254"\w* also unto our \w enemies|strong="H8130"\w*, and \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against us, and \add so\add* get them \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

Therefore they did \w set|strong="H7760"\w* over them \w taskmasters|strong="H4522"\w* to \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* them with their \w burdens|strong="H5450"\w*. And they \w built|strong="H1129"\w* for \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w treasure|strong="H4543"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w Pithom|strong="H6619"\w* and \w Raamses|strong="H7486"\w*.

But the more they \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w* them, the \w more|strong="H3651"\w* they \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* and \w grew|strong="H6555"\w*. And they were \w grieved|strong="H6973"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 1.12 \ft But…: Heb. And as they afflicted them, so they multiplied, etc\f*
And the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w made|strong="H5647"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* with \w rigour|strong="H6531"\w*:

And they \w made|strong="H4843"\w* their \w lives|strong="H2416"\w* \w bitter|strong="H4843"\w* with \w hard|strong="H7186"\w* \w bondage|strong="H5656"\w*, in \w morter|strong="H2563"\w*, and in \w brick|strong="H3843"\w*, and in all manner of \w service|strong="H5656"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*: all their \w service|strong="H5656"\w*, wherein they made them \w serve|strong="H5647"\w*, \add was\add* with \w rigour|strong="H6531"\w*.

¶ And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w* \w midwives|strong="H3205"\w*, of which the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \add was\add* \w Shiphrah|strong="H8236"\w*, and the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w Puah|strong="H6326"\w*:

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, When ye do the office of a \w midwife|strong="H3205"\w* to the Hebrew \w women|strong="H5680"\w*, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add them\add* upon the \w stools|strong="H0070"\w*; if it \add be\add* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, then ye shall \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* him: but if it \add be\add* a \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, then she shall \w live|strong="H2425"\w*.

But the \w midwives|strong="H3205"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w did|strong="H6213"\w* not as the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w commanded|strong="H1696"\w* them, but \w saved|strong="H2421"\w* the men \w children|strong="H3206"\w* \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for the \w midwives|strong="H3205"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Why|strong="H4069"\w* have ye \w done|strong="H6213"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*, and have \w saved|strong="H2421"\w* the men \w children|strong="H3206"\w* \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*?

And the \w midwives|strong="H3205"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, Because the \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \add are\add* not as the Egyptian \w women|strong="H4713"\w*; for they \add are\add* \w lively|strong="H2422"\w*, and are \w delivered|strong="H3205"\w* \w ere|strong="H2962"\w* the \w midwives|strong="H3205"\w* come \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto them.

Therefore \w God|strong="H0430"\w* dealt \w well|strong="H3190"\w* with the \w midwives|strong="H3205"\w*: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w*, and waxed \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w mighty|strong="H6105"\w*.
And it came to pass, because the \w midwives|strong="H3205"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, that he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* them \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*.

And \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* all his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Every \w son|strong="H1121"\w* that is \w born|strong="H3209"\w* ye shall \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* into the \w river|strong="H2975"\w*, and every \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* ye shall save \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*.
